title: SAP: Get sales order status by ID in bulk using BAPI
description: This workflow template triggers when a new sales order status message is added to a Microsoft Teams channel. The workflow gets the SAP sales order status from Teams channels. The template uses SAP's standard BAPI 'BAPI_SALESORDER_GETSTATUS'. For more information, see [Connect to SAP from Standard logic apps using BAPI and RFC](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2282035).
